DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine safety effectiveness 3 asoprisnil dos administer postmenopausal woman Premarin® 0.625 mg .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Effectiveness Asoprisnil Estrogen Administration Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study determine safety effectiveness asoprisnil 5 , 10 , 25 mg , compare placebo , administer postmenopausal woman , Premarin® 0.625 mg , 12 week . Pharmacodynamic effect assess include bleed pattern , endometrial biopsy result , endometrial thickness . Safety assessment include clinical laboratory result , physical examination vital sign , pelvic breast examination , ultrasound result , adverse event
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman intact uterus Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 33.0 Good general health Endometrial thickness ≤ 4 mm TVU No history suspect endometrial hyperplasia Negative urine pregnancy test Pap smear last 6 month evidence malignancy premalignant change Mammogram without suspicion malignancy within last 6 month Endometrial biopsy evidence pathologic change within last 6 month Any abnormal lab result studydoctor considers significant History severe reaction hormone therapy Receiving hormone therapy Currently use phytoestrogenic compound , red clover , black cohosh ( Promensil Remifemin ) , dong quai , ginseng soy isoflavones History know suspect cancer basal cell carcinoma Stenosis cervix History reproductive endocrine disorder Washout requirement hormonal therapy meet Ovarian mass Submucus symptomatic fibroid would confound efficacy
